I write research on the side — mostly around language models and medical imaging. A few papers came out of it, which I'm proud of.
Outside of work, I run, go to the gym, and make short videos. One somehow hit 29 million views.
Starting my master's at Northwestern this fall.

en.title: Real-time Digital Human for Dementia Care
en.summary: End-to-end AI companion system with STT + GPT-4o + TTS pipeline, RAG-enhanced dialogue, and NVIDIA Audio2Face + UE5 avatar — finalist in 2025 Cougar Investigator Grant Challenge.
en.problem: Dementia patients lack consistent, responsive companionship. Caregivers face burnout and existing digital solutions cannot sustain natural, multi-turn voice interactions with emotional expressiveness.
en.action: Built an end-to-end real-time pipeline: STT for speech recognition (92% average accuracy), GPT-4o for contextual dialogue generation, and TTS for natural voice output. Integrated Fine-tuning + RAG to improve context retention and recall accuracy by 25%. Combined NVIDIA Audio2Face with Unreal Engine 5 for lip-sync and facial expression animation, boosting realism and immersion by 30%.
en.result: Achieved smooth multi-turn voice interaction with 3-4 second response latency. Context retention and recall accuracy improved by 25% via RAG. Avatar realism and immersion improved by 30% via Audio2Face + UE5. Selected as finalist in 2025 Cougar Investigator Grant Challenge (Shark Tank format).
en.learnings: Deepened understanding of multimodal AI pipeline integration (STT → LLM → TTS → Avatar), real-time streaming architectures, and designing empathetic systems for vulnerable populations.

zh.title: 面向痴呆症人群的实时虚拟人交互系统
zh.summary: 端到端 AI 陪伴系统，集成 STT + GPT-4o + TTS 管线、RAG 增强对话与 NVIDIA Audio2Face + UE5 虚拟人——入围 2025 Cougar Investigator Grant Challenge 决赛。
zh.problem: 痴呆症患者缺乏持续、响应及时的陪伴。护理者面临倦怠问题，现有数字方案无法维持自然的多轮语音交互和情感表达。
zh.action: 构建端到端实时管线：STT 语音识别（平均准确率 92%）、GPT-4o 上下文对话生成、TTS 自然语音输出。引入 Fine-tuning + RAG 将上下文保持与信息召回准确性提升 25%。结合 NVIDIA Audio2Face + UE5 实现口型与表情动画，拟真度与沉浸感提升 30%。
zh.result: 实现流畅多轮语音交互，响应延迟 3-4 秒。通过 RAG 上下文保持与召回准确性提升 25%；通过 Audio2Face + UE5 拟真度与沉浸感提升 30%。入围 2025 Cougar Investigator Grant Challenge 决赛（Shark Tank 形式）。
zh.learnings: 深入理解多模态 AI 管线集成（STT → LLM → TTS → Avatar）、实时流式架构，以及为弱势群体设计有同理心的系统。

en.title: Plant Disease Classification System with Explainable AI
en.summary: Deep learning classification system achieving 91% accuracy via model stacking + CNNs, with Grad-CAM explainability and LLM-powered treatment recommendations.
en.problem: Plant disease identification requires expert knowledge that is inaccessible to most farmers. Existing CV models lack explainability and actionable treatment guidance, limiting practical adoption.
en.action: Designed and trained multiple CNN models for five-class disease image classification, improved accuracy to 91% via model stacking strategy, and addressed class imbalance through data augmentation and resampling. Applied Grad-CAM for decision process visualization. Developed a Streamlit web application integrated with ChatGPT for automated diagnosis and treatment recommendations.
en.result: Achieved 91% classification accuracy across 5 disease categories. Grad-CAM visualizations enhanced model transparency. LLM integration provided actionable treatment plans, forming a complete decision support system deployable via smartphone.
en.learnings: Learned the importance of combining classification accuracy with explainability for real-world trust, and how to integrate LLMs to bridge model predictions and human-actionable guidance.

zh.title: 基于深度学习的植物病害分类系统（可解释性分析）
zh.summary: 采用模型堆叠 + CNN 达到 91% 准确率的深度学习分类系统，具备 Grad-CAM 可解释性和 LLM 驱动的治疗建议。
zh.problem: 植物病害识别需要专家知识，大多数农民难以获取。现有 CV 模型缺乏可解释性和可操作的治疗指导，限制了实际应用。
zh.action: 设计并训练多个 CNN 模型进行五分类病害图像识别，通过模型堆叠（stacking）策略将准确率提升至 91%，结合数据增强和类别平衡技术保持泛化能力。通过 Grad-CAM 对决策过程进行可视化。开发基于 Streamlit 的 Web 应用，集成 ChatGPT 提供自动化诊断与治疗建议。
zh.result: 在 5 个疾病类别中达到 91% 分类准确率。Grad-CAM 可视化增强了模型透明度。LLM 集成提供可操作的治疗方案，形成可通过智能手机部署的完整决策支持系统。
zh.learnings: 认识到在实际应用中将分类准确率与可解释性相结合的重要性，以及如何利用 LLM 将模型预测转化为人类可操作的指导。

en.title: Curvature-Regularized Robust Medical Image Classification
en.summary: Novel deep learning framework combining CURE loss, depthwise separable & dilated convolutions, and attention mechanisms — achieving only 5.6% accuracy drop under adversarial attacks.
en.problem: Medical image classification models are vulnerable to adversarial perturbations, raising safety concerns in clinical deployment. Standard training fails to produce robust models under input noise.
en.action: Developed MedMamba framework applying curvature regularization (CURE) to control Hessian eigenvalues for enhanced robustness. Designed a dual-branch SS-Convd-SSM module combining dilated and depthwise separable convolutions with attention for precise feature extraction. Validated robustness through FGSM and PGD adversarial attacks.
en.result: Under adversarial attack, the model showed only a 5.6% drop in average accuracy and 4.1% drop in AUC — demonstrating strong robustness compared to baseline methods. Published at ICCGIV 2024.
en.learnings: Gained expertise in adversarial robustness, curvature regularization theory, and designing neural architectures that balance efficiency with resilience to input perturbations.

zh.title: 基于曲率正则化的鲁棒医学图像分类（PATHMNIST）
zh.summary: 结合 CURE 损失、深度可分离卷积/膨胀卷积与注意力机制的新型深度学习框架——在对抗攻击下准确率仅下降 5.6%。
zh.problem: 医学图像分类模型容易受到对抗性扰动影响，在临床部署中存在安全隐患。标准训练无法在输入噪声下产生鲁棒模型。
zh.action: 开发 MedMamba 框架，利用曲率正则化（CURE）控制 Hessian 特征值增强鲁棒性。设计双分支 SS-Convd-SSM 模块，结合膨胀卷积和深度可分离卷积与注意力机制实现精确特征提取。通过 FGSM 和 PGD 对抗攻击验证鲁棒性。
zh.result: 在对抗攻击下，模型平均准确率仅下降 5.6%，AUC 仅下降 4.1%——相比基线方法展现出强鲁棒性。论文发表于 ICCGIV 2024。
zh.learnings: 深入掌握了对抗鲁棒性、曲率正则化理论，以及设计兼顾效率与输入扰动韧性的神经网络架构。

en.title: Privacy Dataset Distillation for Medical Imaging (OCTMNIST)
en.summary: Data distillation method balancing privacy protection with key feature retention — achieving 47.25% accuracy under IPC=1, surpassing existing best results.
en.problem: Medical image datasets contain sensitive patient information. Training on raw data risks privacy breaches, while naive anonymization destroys critical diagnostic features.
en.action: Co-designed a distillation method introducing class-centric and covariance-matching constraints. Conducted multiple experiments under varied images-per-class (IPC=1,2,5,10) settings. Benchmarked against DC, DM, and DSA3 methods. Assessed privacy by quantifying structural similarity between original and distilled images.
en.result: Achieved 47.25% accuracy under IPC=1, surpassing existing best results. Cross-class SSIM ranged 0.68–0.75 and L2 norm 0.59–0.65, demonstrating effective anonymization. Published at AASIP 2024.
en.learnings: Deepened understanding of privacy-utility tradeoffs in dataset distillation and the role of structural constraints in preserving discriminative features while ensuring anonymization.

zh.title: 基于类中心化与协方差匹配的隐私医学图像数据集蒸馏（OCTMNIST）
zh.summary: 平衡隐私保护与关键特征保留的数据蒸馏方法——在 IPC=1 下达到 47.25% 准确率，超越现有最优结果。
zh.problem: 医学图像数据集包含敏感患者信息。直接训练存在隐私泄露风险，而简单匿名化会破坏关键诊断特征。
zh.action: 共同设计引入类中心化和协方差匹配约束的蒸馏方法。在不同每类图像数（IPC=1,2,5,10）设置下进行多组实验。与 DC、DM、DSA3 方法进行基准对比。通过量化原始与蒸馏图像的结构相似性评估隐私保护效果。
zh.result: 在 IPC=1 下达到 47.25% 准确率，超越现有最优结果。跨类 SSIM 在 0.68-0.75 范围，L2 范数在 0.59-0.65 范围，证明了有效的匿名化。论文发表于 AASIP 2024。
zh.learnings: 深入理解了数据集蒸馏中隐私-效用的权衡，以及结构约束在保留判别特征同时确保匿名化中的作用。

en.title: Improving Negative Rejection Ability in Language Models: A Review of Fine-Tuned LLMs, RAG, and RAFT
en.venue: Journal of King Saud University – Computer and Information Sciences (SCI Q1)
en.authors: B. Li, Z. Zhong, H. Zhang, X. Sun, B. Ihnaini
en.abstract: A systematic survey comparing Fine-Tuning, RAG, and RAFT approaches for improving LLM negative rejection ability and safety. Establishes a unified framework for evaluating rejection performance across different model architectures and identifies applicable scenarios for each approach.

zh.title: 改进大语言模型的负向拒识能力：基于 Fine-Tuning、RAG 与 RAFT 的综述研究
zh.venue: Journal of King Saud University – Computer and Information Sciences (SCI Q1)
zh.authors: B. Li, Z. Zhong, H. Zhang, X. Sun, B. Ihnaini

en.title: Robust Medical Image Classification with Curvature Regularization on the PATHMNIST
en.venue: Fourth International Conference on Computer Graphics, Image, and Virtualization (ICCGIV 2024)
en.authors: G. Yang, J. Qi, X. Sun
en.abstract: Proposes a curvature-regularized deep learning framework (MedMamba) for robust pathological image classification. Combines CURE loss with dual-branch convolution and attention modules. Under FGSM and PGD adversarial attacks, achieves only 5.6% accuracy drop and 4.1% AUC drop.

zh.title: 基于 PATHMNIST 的曲率正则化鲁棒医学图像分类
zh.venue: 第四届计算机图形学、图像与虚拟化国际会议 (ICCGIV 2024)
zh.authors: G. Yang, J. Qi, X. Sun
zh.abstract: 提出用于鲁棒病理图像分类的曲率正则化深度学习框架（MedMamba）。结合 CURE 损失与双分支卷积及注意力模块。在 FGSM 和 PGD 对抗攻击下，准确率仅下降 5.6%，AUC 仅下降 4.1%。

en.title: Privacy Dataset Distillation for Medical Imaging Using Class Centralization and Covariance Matching for OCTMNIST
en.venue: Fourth International Conference on Advanced Algorithms and Signal Image Processing (AASIP 2024)
en.authors: X. Sun, D. Li, G. Yang
en.abstract: Introduces a privacy-preserving dataset distillation method combining class-centric and covariance-matching constraints. Achieves 47.25% accuracy under IPC=1 on OCTMNIST, surpassing DC, DM, and DSA3 baselines, with cross-class SSIM 0.68–0.75 confirming effective anonymization.

zh.title: 基于类中心化与协方差匹配的 OCTMNIST 隐私医学图像数据集蒸馏
zh.venue: 第四届高级算法与信号图像处理国际会议 (AASIP 2024)
zh.authors: X. Sun, D. Li, G. Yang
zh.abstract: 提出结合类中心化和协方差匹配约束的隐私保护数据集蒸馏方法。在 OCTMNIST 上 IPC=1 条件下达到 47.25% 准确率，超越 DC、DM、DSA3 基线。跨类 SSIM 0.68-0.75 验证了有效的匿名化。
